summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing a forwarded message from Story Cowles regarding a lawsuit claiming that a former firm leader was involved in promoting fraudulent investments related to a sex scandal case. The email emphasizes the confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
